n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>HR</SCHEMA> <NAME>LOCATIONS</NAME> <EDITIONING_VIEW></EDITIONING_VIEW> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>LOCATION_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>STREET_ADDRESS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>POSTAL_CODE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CITY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>STATE_PROVINCE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COUNTRY_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>SELECT location_id, street_address, postal_code, city, state_province, country_id FROM locations$0</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
